description: Ancient Egypt Research Associates, Inc. (AERA) is pleased to announce the following titles available for free download through our website, <www.aeraweb.org>: Giza Occasional Papers 5: Giza Plateau Mapping Project Season 2009 Preliminary Report, ed. by Mark Lehner, published in 2011. AERA Field Manual Series 1: A Manual of Egyptian Pottery by Anna Wodzinska, published in 2010. Volume 1, revised edition (Fayum A - Lower Egyptian Culture) Volume 2, revised edition (Naqada III - Middle Kingdom) Volume 3 (Second Intermediate Period - Late Period) Volume 4 (Ptolemaic Period - Modern) These titles are also still available for sale from David Brown/Oxbow Books: <www.oxbowbooks.com>. The David Brown Book Co PO Box 511 (28 Main Street)  Oakville CT 06779  Toll- free: 800 791 9354 Tel: 860 945 9329 Fax: 860 945 9468 - - - - - Alexandra Witsell Managing Editor, Publications Ancient Egypt Research Associates (AERA) Boston
